org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_stitching

Class AffineWarper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_stitching.RotationWarper
        • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_stitching.DetailPlaneWarper
          • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_stitching.AffineWarper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="cv::detail")
 @Properties(inherit=opencv_stitching.class)
public class AffineWarper
extends DetailPlaneWarper
    \brief Affine warper that uses rotations and translations

    Uses affine transformation in homogeneous coordinates to represent both rotation and translation in camera rotation matrix.

    • Nested Class Summary
